mapper.select: SELECT m.memberIdx, membership, userId, userName, userPwd, regDate, lastLogin, pwdDate FROM member m JOIN member1 m1 ON m1.memberIdx = m.memberIdx WHERE userId = #{userId} AND enabled != 0 AND membership = 51
mapper.update: UPDATE member1 SET lastLogin = SYSDATE, failureCnt = 0 WHERE userId=#{userId}

INSERT ALL INTO member1(memberIdx, userId, userName, userPwd, enabled, regDate, pwdDate, failureCnt, lastLogin, totalMileage) VALUES (#{memberIdx}, #{userId}, #{userName}, #{userPwd}, 1, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, 0, SYSDATE, 0) INTO member2(userId, birth, email, tel, zip, addr1, addr2) VALUES (#{userId}, #{birth}, #{email}, #{tel}, #{zip, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addr1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addr2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) SELECT * FROM dual
mapper.select: SELECT m.memberIdx, membership, m1.userId, userName, userPwd, enabled, regDate, pwdDate, lastLogin, totalMileage, TO_CHAR(birth, 'YYYY-MM-DD') birth, email, tel, zip, addr1, addr2, nickName, content, photo FROM member m JOIN member1 m1 ON m.memberIdx = m1.memberIdx LEFT OUTER JOIN member2 m2 ON m1.userId = m2.userId LEFT OUTER JOIN plus p ON p.userId = m1.userId WHERE m1.userId = #{userId}

SELECT m.memberIdx, membership, enabled, NVL(m1.userId, 'guest') userId, NVL(userName, '손님') userName, userPwd, regDate, pwdDate, lastLogin, totalMileage, TO_CHAR(birth, 'YYYY-MM-DD') birth, email, tel, zip, addr1, addr2, nickName, content, photo FROM member m LEFT OUTER JOIN member1 m1 ON m.memberIdx = m1.memberIdx LEFT OUTER JOIN member2 m2 ON m1.userId = m2.userId LEFT OUTER JOIN plus p ON p.userId = m1.userId WHERE m.memberIdx = #{memberIdx}
mapper.update: UPDATE member1 SET enabled=#{enabled} WHERE userId=#{userId}
UPDATE member1 SET userPwd=#{userPwd}, pwdDate=SYSDATE WHERE userId=#{userId}
UPDATE plus SET photo=#{photo}, content=#{content}, nickName = #{nickName} WHERE userId=#{userId}
UPDATE member1 SET failureCnt = 0 WHERE userId = #{userId}
UPDATE member1 SET failureCnt = failureCnt + 1 WHERE userId = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO memberState(num, userId, stateDate, stateCode, memo, adminId) VALUES (memberState_seq.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, SYSDATE, #{stateCode}, #{memo}, #{adminId})
mapper.update: UPDATE memberAuthority SET authority = #{authority} WHERE userId = #{userId}
